  \item Opera els complexos 
  
  
      \begin{tasks}(1)
        \task $\left( 7 - 5\, i\right) \cdot \left( 3\, i \right)$ 
  
  
        \task $\dfrac{1}{-2 + 7\, i}$ 
  
  
        \task $\left( -6 - 4\, i\right) \cdot \left( -4 - 3\, i \right)$ 
  
  
        \task $\dfrac{1}{7 - 5\, i}$ 
  
  
        \task $\dfrac{\left( 10 + 5\, i\right) \cdot \left( 9 + 9\, i \right)}{4 + 3\, i -2 - 8\, i}$ 
  
  
        \task! $\left(10 + 8\, i+ 4 + 10\, i\right) \cdot \left( -2 - 3\, i- \left(5 + 7\, i\right) \right)$ 
  
  
        \task! $\left(6 - 10\, i\right) \cdot \left(-7 + 9\, i + \dfrac{ 10 - 3\, i}{10 - 5\, i} \right)$ 
  
  
        \task $\left( -2 - 8\, i+ 1 + 5\, i \right)^{2}$ 
  
  
      \end{tasks}
      
  \item Calcula la inversa de les matrius (si existeix) 
  
  
      \begin{tasks}(1)
        \task $M = \left( \begin{array}{cc} -4 & 5 \\[2mm] -5 & 1 \end{array} \right)$ 
  
  
        \task $M = \left( \begin{array}{cc} -3 & -3 \\[2mm] 4 & 4 \end{array} \right)$ 
  
  
        \task! $M = \left( \begin{array}{ccc} -3 & 0 & -4 \\[2mm] 3 & -4 & -4 \\[2mm] -2 & -2 & 2 \end{array} \right)$ 
  
  
        \task! $M = \left( \begin{array}{ccc} -4 & 4 & -5 \\[2mm] -4 & 3 & 5 \\[2mm] 1 & -2 & 4 \end{array} \right)$ 
  
  
      \end{tasks}
      
  \item Resol les equacions matricials 
  
  
      \begin{tasks}(1)
        \task! $A\cdot X = B$,  $\quad$ essent $\quad$ $A=\left( \begin{array}{cc} -2 & -5 \\[2mm] -5 & 5 \end{array} \right)\,$, $B=\left( \begin{array}{cc} -2 & 4 \\[2mm] -1 & 0 \end{array} \right)$ 
  
  
        \task! $X \cdot A = B$, $\quad$  essent $\quad$ $A=\left( \begin{array}{ccc} -2 & -3 & -1 \\[2mm] 0 & 1 & -3 \\[2mm] 0 & 0 & 3 \end{array} \right)\,$, $B=\left( \begin{array}{ccc} 1 & -4 & 5 \\[2mm] -5 & -5 & -3 \\[2mm] -3 & -1 & 5 \end{array} \right)$ 
  
  
        \task! $X \cdot A = X + B^{2}$,  $\quad$ essent $\quad$ $A=\left( \begin{array}{cc} -4 & -2 \\[2mm] 2 & 2 \end{array} \right)\,$, $B=\left( \begin{array}{cc} -4 & -2 \\[2mm] -5 & 3 \end{array} \right)$ 
  
  
        \task! $X \cdot A = X + B^{2}$,  $\quad$ essent $\quad$ $A=\left( \begin{array}{cc} -2 & -1 \\[2mm] 3 & -2 \end{array} \right)\,$, $B=\left( \begin{array}{cc} 5 & 2 \\[2mm] -2 & -2 \end{array} \right)$ 
  
  
      \end{tasks}
      
  \item Calcula tots els possibles productes amb les matrius seg√ºents 
  
  
      \begin{tasks}(1)
        \task! $A = \left( \begin{array}{cc} -4 & -1 \\[2mm] -5 & -5 \end{array} \right)$,$\,\,$ $B = \left( \begin{array}{cc} -3 & -3 \\[2mm] 5 & 3 \end{array} \right)$,$\,\,$ $C = \left( \begin{array}{ccc} 2 & -2 & -4 \\[2mm] -2 & 3 & 0 \\[2mm] -2 & 1 & 2 \end{array} \right)$ 
  
  
        \task! $A = \left( \begin{array}{c} 3 \\[2mm] 2 \end{array} \right)$,$\,\,$ $B = \left( \begin{array}{cc} -4 & -3 \\[2mm] -5 & -3 \end{array} \right)$,$\,\,$ $C = \left( \begin{array}{ccc} 2 & 2 & -2 \\[2mm] 0 & -4 & -3 \\[2mm] -1 & -4 & 5 \end{array} \right)$ 
  
  
      \end{tasks}
      
  \item

        \task $y = -x^2 -2\,x -10$ 
  
  
      \end{tasks}
